verses.name: Leviticus 20:6
verses.text: And the soul that turneth after such as have familiar spirits, and after wizards, to go a whoring after them, I will even set my face against that soul, and will cut him off from among his people.

verses.name: Leviticus 20:7
verses.text: Sanctify yourselves therefore, and be ye holy: for I am the Lord your God.

verses.name: Leviticus 20:8
verses.text: And ye shall keep my statutes, and do them: I am the Lord which sanctify you.

verses.name: Leviticus 20:9
verses.text: For every one that curseth his father or his mother shall be surely put to death: he hath cursed his father or his mother; his blood shall be upon him.
